snippet: The speaker of Israel’s Parliament ordered a blood-collection crew to leave the legislature’s premises on Wednesday after it turned down an offer of a blood donation from an Ethiopian-born lawmaker.
abstract: Speaker of Israel’s Parliament orders a blood-collection crew to leave the legislature’s premises after it turns down an offer of a blood donation from an Ethiopian-born lawmaker.
lead_paragraph: The speaker of Israel’s Parliament ordered a blood-collection crew to leave the legislature’s premises on Wednesday after it turned down an offer of a blood donation from an Ethiopian-born lawmaker.
